text: Ghazi Abderrazzak (born 16 October 1986) is a Tunisian footballer for US Ben Guerdane on loan from Club Africain. ==References== ==External links== *Ghazi Abderrazzak at Footballdatabase Category:1986 births Category:Living people Category:Tunisian footballers Category:Tunisian expatriate footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:ES Hammam-Sousse players Category:Ohod Club players Category:Étoile Sportive du Sahel players Category:Club Africain players Category:US Ben Guerdane players Category:Saudi Professional League players Category:Tunisian Ligue Professionnelle 1 players Category:Expatriate footballers in Saudi Arabia Category:Tunisian expatriate sportspeople in Saudi Arabia
title: Ghazi Abderrazzak
